author: Bill Bostock
title: The CDC is considering encouraging people to cover their faces in public, but would reserve masks for medical workers
description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) may start urging Americans to cover their faces to slow the spread of the coronavirus outbreak, according to The Washington Post. If the advice is updated, the CDC will stress that surgical masks are for me…
content:
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) may soon advise Americans to cover their faces to hamper the coronavirus spread, but would reserve masks for medical workers.
The CDC currently "does not recommend that people who are well wear a facemask … [+3775 chars]
